segments.text: Hey Matt . I just got a job at a consulting firm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so happy . I don't have to worry about finding a job and interviewing anymore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to have to put in a lot of hours you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I'm a little nervous , but it's pretty exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet . You must be stoked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I'm going to celebrate tonight . Wanna hang out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . How about Toby ? Should we call him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . He's a little depressed . He's having a hard time finding a job right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should still tell him . In the least , I can refer him to my company . It might help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea .
segments.speaker: S2
